material.mattext: 1 What is Cloud Computing?
A method to store data on local devices
A method to store data on servers accessible over the internet
A method to store data on peer-to-peer networks
A method to store data on external hard drives
2 What are the main characteristics of Cloud Computing?
On-demand self-service, broad network access, resource pooling, rapid elasticity, and measured service
On-demand self-service, restricted network access, resource isolation, rapid elasticity, and limited service
On-demand self-service, narrow network access, resource pooling, slow elasticity, and measured service
On-demand self-service, broad network access, resource isolation, rapid elasticity, and measured service
3 Which of the following is not a Cloud Computing service model?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
4 Which Cloud Computing service model allows the most flexibility?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
5 What is the main advantage of Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)?
Access to a wide range of pre-built applications
Ability to customize the operating system and applications
Access to pre-built databases and storage solutions
Ability to customize the hardware and network infrastructure
6 Which Cloud Computing service model provides the most abstraction?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
7 Which Cloud Computing deployment model allows multiple organizations to share resources?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
8 What is the main advantage of a Public Cloud deployment model?
Lower cost
Higher security
Greater control
More customization
9 What is the main advantage of a Private Cloud deployment model?
Lower cost
Higher security
Greater control
More customization
10 What is the main advantage of a Hybrid Cloud deployment model?
Lower cost
Higher security
Greater control
More customization
11 What is Cloud Storage?
A way to store data on local devices
A way to store data on servers accessible over the internet
A way to store data on peer-to-peer networks
A way to store data on external hard drives
12 What is Cloud Backup?
A way to backup data to local devices
A way to backup data to servers accessible over the internet
A way to backup data to peer-to-peer networks
A way to backup data to external hard drives
13 What is Cloud Computing Security?
A method to secure data on local devices
A method to secure data on servers accessible over the internet
A method to secure data on peer-to-peer networks
A method to secure data on external hard drives
14 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to develop and run applications without having to manage the underlying infrastructure?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
15 What is the difference between a Public Cloud and a Private Cloud?
Public Cloud is open to the public, while Private Cloud is only accessible to a single organization.
Public Cloud is more secure than Private Cloud.
Public Cloud is more expensive than Private Cloud.
Public Cloud is less flexible than Private Cloud.
16 Which Cloud Computing deployment model is the most secure?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
17 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to access software applications over the internet?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
18 Which of the following is an example of a Cloud Computing provider?
Amazon Web Services (AWS)
Microsoft Office
Adobe Photoshop
Oracle Database
19 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to provide users with access to databases without having to manage the underlying hardware and software?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
20 Which Cloud Computing deployment model is used by multiple organizations that have a common goal?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
21 What is Cloud Bursting?
The process of transferring data from a Cloud to a local device
The process of transferring data from a local device to a Cloud
The process of transferring data between two Clouds
The process of automatically scaling resources between a Private Cloud and a Public Cloud
22 What is a Virtual Machine (VM)?
A physical server
A software implementation of a computer that behaves like a physical computer
A database management system
A software application that runs on a physical computer
23 What is a Hypervisor?
A type of virtual machine
A software layer that allows multiple virtual machines to run on a physical machine
A database management system
A software application that runs on a physical computer
24 What is a Cloud Computing Provider?
A company that provides Cloud Computing services
A company that develops Cloud Computing software
A company that manages Cloud Computing infrastructure
A company that provides Cloud Computing support services
25 Which Cloud Computing deployment model is used by a single organization that has complete control over the resources?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
26 What is Cloud Computing Architecture?
The physical layout of servers and networking equipment in a Cloud Computing environment
The logical layout of servers and networking equipment in a Cloud Computing environment
The software used to manage and operate a Cloud Computing environment
The security measures used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
27 What is Cloud Computing Automation?
The process of manually managing a Cloud Computing environment
The process of using software tools to automatically manage and provision resources in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
28 What is a Cloud Computing SLA?
A legal agreement between a Cloud Computing provider and a customer that defines the level of service to be provided
A software tool used to manage resources in a Cloud Computing environment
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
29 What is Cloud Computing Orchestration?
The process of managing and automating the deployment of virtual machines and other resources in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing a Cloud Computing environment
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
30 Which Cloud Computing deployment model combines the use of Public and Private Clouds?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
31 What is Cloud Computing Security?
The measures taken to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
The measures taken to protect physical servers in a Cloud Computing environment
The measures taken to protect software applications in a Cloud Computing environment
The measures taken to protect networking equipment in a Cloud Computing environment
32 What is a Cloud Computing Cluster?
A group of physical servers working together to provide Cloud Computing services
A group of virtual machines working together to provide Cloud Computing services
A group of software applications working together to provide Cloud Computing services
A group of networking devices working together to provide Cloud Computing services
33 What is a Cloud Computing Data Center?
A physical location where Cloud Computing resources are housed and managed
A software application used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
34 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to provide users with access to virtualized hardware resources? Answer: A
35 Which Cloud Computing deployment model allows multiple organizations to share resources and infrastructure?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
36 What is Cloud Computing Load Balancing?
The process of automatically distributing network traffic across multiple servers to improve performance and reliability in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing network traffic in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of managing and automating the deployment of virtual machines and other resources in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
37 What is Cloud Computing Scalability?
The ability to increase or decrease the amount of resources in a Cloud Computing environment to meet changing demands
The ability to maintain the same level of resources in a Cloud Computing environment regardless of demand
The ability to outsource Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The ability to manually manage resources in a Cloud Computing environment
38 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to provide users with access to a pre-configured software application?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
39 What is Cloud Computing Monitoring?
The process of tracking and analyzing the performance of Cloud Computing resources to ensure they are operating efficiently and effectively
The process of physically inspecting Cloud Computing servers and equipment to ensure they are working properly
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
40 What is Cloud Computing Virtualization?
The process of creating a virtual version of a physical server or resource in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing a Cloud Computing environment
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
41 Which Cloud Computing deployment model is used by a single organization that uses resources from a third-party provider?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
42 What is Cloud Computing Redundancy?
The process of ensuring that multiple copies of data are stored in a Cloud Computing environment to prevent data loss
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
43 What is a Cloud Computing Gateway?
A networking device used to connect a private network to a Cloud Computing environment
A software application used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
44 What is Cloud Computing Backup?
The process of copying and storing data in a Cloud Computing environment to ensure data recovery in case of a disaster or data loss
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
45 Which Cloud Computing service model is used to provide users with access to a pre-configured database management system?
Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)
Platform as a Service (PaaS)
Software as a Service (SaaS)
Database as a Service (DBaaS)
46 What is Cloud Computing Automation?
The process of using software tools to automatically manage and provision resources in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing a Cloud Computing environment
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
47 What is a Cloud Computing Provider?
A company that offers Cloud Computing services to customers
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
48 What is Cloud Computing Billing?
49 Which Cloud Computing deployment model is used by multiple organizations that share resources from a third-party provider?
Public Cloud
Private Cloud
Hybrid Cloud
Community Cloud
50 What is Cloud Computing Load Balancing?
The process of distributing network traffic across multiple servers in a Cloud Computing environment to ensure optimal performance and availability
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
51 What is a Cloud Computing Broker?
An intermediary that connects customers to multiple Cloud Computing providers
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
52 What is Cloud Computing Security?
The process of protecting data and resources in a Cloud Computing environment from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
53 What is Cloud Computing Storage?
The process of storing data in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
54 What is a Cloud Computing Cluster?
A group of servers in a Cloud Computing environment that work together to provide a high level of performance and availability
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
55 What is Cloud Computing Compliance?
The process of ensuring that Cloud Computing services comply with legal and regulatory requirements
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
56 What is a Cloud Computing Marketplace?
A platform where customers can browse, purchase, and use Cloud Computing services from multiple providers
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
57 What is Cloud Computing Migration?
The process of moving data and applications from a local environment to a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of storing data in a Cloud Computing environment
58 What is a Cloud Computing Disaster Recovery Plan?
A plan that outlines the steps to be taken in the event of a disaster or data loss in a Cloud Computing environment
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
59 What is Cloud Computing Resource Pooling?
The process of combining resources from multiple servers to create a single, virtual resource in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
60 What is a Cloud Computing Gateway?
A device or software that connects a local network to a Cloud Computing environment
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
61 What is Cloud Computing Virtualization?
The process of creating virtual resources in a Cloud Computing environment
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
62 What is Cloud Computing Data Centre? Answer: A
A facility used to house servers and other equipment for Cloud Computing services
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
63 What is Cloud Computing Orchestration?
The process of automating the deployment and management of Cloud Computing resources
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
64 What is a Cloud Computing API?
A programming interface used to access Cloud Computing resources
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
65 What is Cloud Computing IaaS?
Infrastructure as a Service a Cloud Computing service model where customers rent infrastructure resources such as servers, storage, and networking from a provider
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
66 What is Cloud Computing PaaS?
Platform as a Service a Cloud Computing service model where customers rent a platform for developing, testing, and deploying applications from a provider
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
67 What is Cloud Computing SaaS?
Software as a Service a Cloud Computing service model where customers rent software applications from a provider
A software tool used to manage Cloud Computing resources
A security measure used to protect data in a Cloud Computing environment
A hardware device used to store data in a Cloud Computing environment
68 What is Cloud Computing Scalability?
The ability of a Cloud Computing environment to expand or contract resources as needed to meet demand
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud Computing services to a third-party provider
The process of migrating data from a local storage device to a Cloud storage service
69 What is Cloud Computing Multi-tenancy?
The ability of a Cloud Computing environment to serve multiple customers or tenants using shared resources
The process of manually managing Cloud Computing resources
The process of outsourcing Cloud
